segments.text: You look upset , is there anything wrong ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , to tell you the truth , there is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I've lost my wallet and my ID card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's too bad ! I am sorry to hear that !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Forget it , there is no use crying over the spilled milk .
segments.speaker: S2
